attributes.action: Hold a General Election before invoking Article 50
attributes.additional_details:
The Parties should produce manifestos and The People should vote to elect them on issues of

Over 90% of economists and financial institutes believe we will go into recession outside the EU

The spending of money saved from not being a member of EU

A new Immigration policy and system

Terms of new trade deals made with EU
attributes.background: The negotiations on leaving the EU are the most important for a generation.  The People need the opportunity to decide which Parliamentary Party is best to lead  negotiations and the priorities/direction the country takes outside the EU.  This includes polices on the economy and immigration.
